title: Budipest
notGonnaGetThere: We don't think you are going to get there in time

closerToilets.numOfToilets-1: There is a toilet that is closer to you. Are you sure you wanna go to the further one?
closerToilets.numOfToilets-2: There are {numOfToilets} toilets that are closer to you. Are you sure you wanna go there?

irreversibleNote: Do you really want to delete your note? There is no magic undo button!
drag-marker: Hold and drag marker for precise positioning
name: Name

aboutUs.title: About us
aboutUs.opensource: This project was made with Flutter and is open-source.
aboutUs.toiletPaper: Buy us a roll of toilet paper!
aboutUs.toiletPaper-description: Support the costs of server upkeep and the further development of this terrific app. Or don't. We won't judge you.

empty.notes-description: Share your personal review or other useful details about the toilet in a note.

error.title: Something stinks in here...
error.location: We can't find you. Or at least we don't know where you're at. Maybe you declined the location permissions?
error.data: We couldn't retrieve data from the server. Maybe check your connection?
error.onServer: The server can't flush the toilet right now and they're busy with that. Please check back later
